ResourceHeader.ResourceName: IMP8 GME 30-min energetic particle rates and fluxes
ResourceHeader.Description: This CDAWeb-accessible data set contains 30-minute, spin-averaged count rates and fluxes, and their statistical uncertainties, of energetic particles from the IMP8 GME experiment. Included are fluxes of: protons in 30 energy bins from 0.88-1.15 to 327-485 MeV; alpha particles in 29 energy bins from 1.14-1.36 to 382-456 MeV/n; oxygen in 4 bins from 8.8-10.7 to 22.0-40.8 MeV/n; CNO combined in 6 bins from 1.5-1.9 to 5.8-8.4 MeV/n; iron in two bins, 8.8-13.2 and 13.8-40.9 MeV/n; one bin near 10-40 MeV for each of C, N, Ne, Mg and Si; and 0.3-18 MeV electrons. Also included are count rates for each of 7 sensors and for 11 multi-sensor coincidence modes.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Acknowledge Robert E. McGuire, the PI.

AccessURL.Name: CDAWeb
AccessURL.Description: Subset, plot and list via CDAWeb; ASCII output option

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Acknowledge Robert E. McGuire, the PI, and CDAWeb

Parameter.Name: Proton fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of protons, at 30-min resolution, in 30 energy bins ranging from 0.88-1.15 MeV to 327-485 MeV, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes and corresponding uncertainties at 30 energy windows

Parameter.Name: Alpha particle fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of alpha particles, at 30-min resolution, in 29 energy bins ranging from 1.14-1.36 MeV/n to 382-456 MeV/n, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes and corresponding uncertainties at 29 energy windows

Parameter.Name: Oxygen nuclei fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of oxygen nuclei, at 30-min resolution, in 4 energy bins ranging from 8.8-10.7 MeV/n to 22.0-40.8 MeV/n, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes and corresponding uncertainties at 4 energy windows

Parameter.Name: CNO fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of CNO nuclei combined, at 30-min resolution, in 6 energy bins ranging from 1.5-1.9 MeV/n to 5.8-8.4 MeV/n, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes and corresponding uncertainties at 6 energy windows

Parameter.Name: Iron nuclei fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of iron nuclei, at 30-min resolution, in 2 energy bins 8.8-13.2 and 13.8-40.9 MeV/n, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes and corresponding uncertainties at 2 energy windows

Parameter.Name: Fluxes for five species
Parameter.Description: One spin-integrated flux for each of five nuclei (C, N, Ne, Mg, Si), at 30-min resolution, near 10-40 MeV/n, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of fluxes and corresponding uncertainties at 1 energy window for each of 5 species

Parameter.Name: Electron fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes of 3-18 MeV electrons, at 30-min resolution, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of one flux and its corresponding uncertainty

Parameter.Name: Elextron background fluxes
Parameter.Description: Spin-integrated fluxes considered as background for 3-18 MeV electron flux, at 30-min resolution, and statistical uncertainties in these fluxes

Structure.Description: Array of one flux and its corresponding uncertainty
